compliance.headline: Secure Technical Documentation
compliance.confidentiality: We understand IP protection. All technical documents are encrypted and confidential. We never share your data or use it for AI training.

faq.question: Can it handle complex technical specifications?
faq.answer: Yes! Our AI is trained on engineering documentation and understands technical terminology, units, tolerances, and standards. Perfect for datasheets, specs, and compliance docs.

faq.question: Are our technical documents and IP protected?
faq.answer: Absolutely! SOC 2 certified with encrypted storage. All technical documents are confidential and never used for AI training. Your IP stays protected.

faq.question: What types of engineering documents can you summarize?
faq.answer: All of them: technical specifications, datasheets, standards (ISO, ASME, etc.), test reports, supplier qualifications, safety docs, quality control reports, and more.

faq.question: How does it help with ISO compliance?
faq.answer: Quickly extract relevant requirements from lengthy ISO standards instead of reading hundreds of pages. Find applicable sections faster and ensure compliance.

faq.question: What plan is best for engineering teams?
faq.answer: Most small teams use the Pro plan ($19/mo). Engineering departments should consider the Team plan ($49/mo) for collaboration. Large manufacturers need Enterprise with advanced security.

faq.question: Can we export summaries for design documentation?
faq.answer: Yes! Export as PDF or Word to include in design reviews, compliance reports, and technical documentation.
